Job Description:
Responsibility 

 Designing,  coding,  testing,  debugging,  documenting and supporting all types of applications consistent with established specifications and business requirements to deliver business value. 

 Design and implement application enhancements in collaboration with different teams. 

 Troubleshoot production support issues post release deployment and come up with solutions.  Ability to solve complex production issues. 

 Help define project plans requiring software development and hardware installations

 Investigate operational or systematic problems and user queries as required

 Follow all department standards and methodologies

 Strong Experience in ASP. Net,  C#,  SQL Server,  WCF,  MVC

 A solid understanding of OOP principles

 A good understanding of 3-tier,  N-tier and MVC architecture

 Attention to detail

 Experience of working effectively as part of a team

 Good written and verbal communication skills

 Inter-personal skills

 A flexible approach and ability to adapt

 Ability to work under own initiative
